word: das Dunkeln, die There is no plural form for "das dunkeln" as it is an abstract noun and does not have a plural form.
definition: To obscure or diminish the amount of light in a given space, often resulting in reduced visibility. It is commonly employed to describe the action of making an area or room darker, typically by closing curtains, turning off lights, or blocking out natural light sources.

examples.english: I am afraid of the dark.
The street lamps shine in the dark.

examples.german: Er hat sich im Dunkeln verlaufen.
examples.english: He got lost in the dark.

examples.german: Sie hat die Vorhänge zugezogen, um das Zimmer abzudunkeln.
examples.english: She closed the curtains to darken the room.
